label.caption: Define connection pool configuration
label.name: poolingProfileLabel

integer.description: Controls the maximum number of connections that can be borrowed from the pool at one time. When set to a negative value, there is no limit to the number of connections that may be active at one time. When maxActive is exceeded, the pool is said to be exhausted.
integer.caption: Max active
integer.name: maxActive

integer.description: Controls the maximum number of connections that can sit idle in the pool at any time. When set to a negative value, there is no limit to the number of connections that may be idle at one time.
integer.caption: Max idle
integer.name: maxIdle

enum.description: Determines how connections in a pool should be initialized. The possible values are: INITIALISE_NONE (will not load any connection into the pool on startup), INITIALISE_ONE (will load one initial connection into the pool on startup), or INITIALISE_ALL (will load all connections in the pool on startup)
enum.caption: Initialisation policy
enum.name: initialisationPolicy

enum.description: Specifies the behavior of the connection pool when the pool is exhausted. Possible values are: "WHEN_EXHAUSTED_FAIL", which will throw a NoSuchElementException, "WHEN_EXHAUSTED_WAIT", which will block by invoking Object.wait(long) until a new or idle object is available, or WHEN_EXHAUSTED_GROW, which will create a new connection and return it, essentially making maxActive meaningless. If a positive maxWait value is supplied, it will block for at most that many milliseconds, after which a NoSuchElementException will be thrown. If maxThreadWait is a negative value, it will block indefinitely.
enum.caption: Exhausted action
enum.name: exhaustedAction

integer.description: Determines the minimum amount of time a connection may sit idle in the pool before it is eligible for eviction. When non-positive, no connections will be evicted from the pool due to idle time alone.
integer.caption: Min eviction (ms)
integer.name: minEvictionMillis

integer.description: Specifies the number of milliseconds between runs of the connection evictor. When non-positive, no connection evictor is executed.
integer.caption: Eviction check interval (ms)
integer.name: evictionCheckIntervalMillis

label.caption: Define how mule should attempt to handle a connection failure
label.name: connectionLabel

radioBoolean.caption: Do not use a Reconnection strategy
radioBoolean.name: noReconnection

radioBoolean.description: A reconnection strategy that allows the user to configure how many times a reconnection should be attempted and how long to wait between attempts.
radioBoolean.caption: Standard Reconnection
radioBoolean.name: standardReconnection

integer.description: How often (in ms) to reconnect
integer.caption: Frequency (ms)
integer.name: reconnectionFrequency

integer.description: How many reconnection attempts to make
integer.caption: Reconnection Attempts
integer.name: reconnectionAttemps

boolean.description: A reconnection strategy that retries an infinite number of times at the specified frequency.
boolean.caption: Reconnect Forever
boolean.name: reconnectForever

classname.description: A class that implements the RetryPolicyTemplate interface.
classname.caption: Class
classname.name: class

name.description: Give a name to this configuration so it can be later referenced by config-ref.
name.caption: Name
name.name: name

string.description: Path relative to the REST api url for the Comment Resource.
string.caption: Comment Endpoint
string.name: commentEndpoint

string.description: Path relative to the REST api url for the File Resource.
string.caption: File Endpoint
string.name: fileEndpoint

integer.description: Port of the connecion.
integer.caption: Port
integer.name: port

string.description: Path relative to the REST api url for the Node Resource.
string.caption: Node Endpoint
string.name: nodeEndpoint

string.description: Path relative to the REST api url for the TaxonomyTerm Resource.
string.caption: Taxonomy Term Endpoint
string.name: taxonomyTermEndpoint

string.description: Path relative to the REST api url for the TaxonomyVocabulary Resource.
string.caption: Taxonomy Vocabulary Endpoint
string.name: taxonomyVocabularyEndpoint

globalRef.caption: Config Reference
globalRef.name: config-ref

radioBoolean.caption: Reference or expression
radioBoolean.name: useReference

radioBoolean.description: Provide a reference to a bean or use an expression
radioBoolean.caption: Reference or expression

integer.description: Primary Key: Unique comment ID.
integer.caption: Cid
integer.name: cid

integer.description: The comment.cid to which this comment is a reply. If set to 0, this comment is not a reply to an existing comment.
integer.caption: Pid
integer.name: pid

integer.description: The node.nid to which this comment is a reply.Check.
integer.caption: Nid
integer.name: nid

integer.description: The users.uid who authored the comment. If set to 0, this comment was created by an anonymous user. See.
integer.caption: Uid
integer.name: uid

integer.description: The time that the comment was created, as a Unix timestamp.
integer.caption: Created
integer.name: created

integer.description: The time that the comment was last edited, as a Unix timestamp.
integer.caption: Changed
integer.name: changed

integer.description: The published status of a comment. (0 = Not Published, 1 = Published) Default value is 1.
integer.caption: Status
integer.name: status

string.description: The vancode representation of the comments place in a thread.
string.caption: Thread
string.name: thread

string.description: The comment authors name. Uses users.name if the user is logged in, otherwise uses the value typed into the comment form. See.
string.caption: Name
string.name: name

string.description: The comment authors e-mail address from the comment form, if user is anonymous, and the Anonymous users may/must leave their contact information setting is turned on. See.
string.caption: Mail
string.name: mail

string.description: The comment authors home page address from the comment form, if user is anonymous, and the Anonymous users may/must leave their contact information setting is turned on.
string.caption: Homepage
string.name: homepage

radioBoolean.description: Provide a reference to a bean or use an expression
radioBoolean.caption: Reference or expression
radioBoolean.name: useReference

radioBoolean.description: Provide a reference to a bean or use an expression
radioBoolean.caption: Reference or expression
radioBoolean.name: useReference

integer.description: File Id.
integer.caption: Fid
integer.name: fid

integer.description: The users.uid of the user who is associated with the file. See.
integer.caption: Uid
integer.name: uid

string.description: Name of the file with no path components. This may differ from the basename of the URI if the file is renamed to avoid overwriting an existing file.
string.caption: Filename
string.name: filename

integer.description: The size of the file in bytes.
integer.caption: Filesize
integer.name: filesize

integer.description: A field indicating the status of the file. Two status are defined in core: temporary (0) and permanent (1). Temporary files older than DRUPAL_MAXIMUM_TEMP_FILE_AGE will be removed during a cron run.
integer.caption: Status
integer.name: status

integer.description: Timestamp for when the file was added.
integer.caption: Timestamp
integer.name: timestamp

radioBoolean.description: Provide a reference to a bean or use an expression
radioBoolean.caption: Reference or expression
radioBoolean.name: useReference

integer.description: The primary identifier for a node.
integer.caption: Nid
integer.name: nid

integer.description: The users uid that owns this node; initially, this is the user that created it. See.
integer.caption: Uid
integer.name: uid

integer.description: The current node revision id version identifier.
integer.caption: Vid
integer.name: vid

string.description: The machine-readable name of this type of this node.
string.caption: Type
string.name: type

string.description: The title of this node, always treated as non-markup plain text.
string.caption: Title
string.name: title

integer.description: Boolean indicating whether the node is published (visible to non-administrators).
integer.caption: Status
integer.name: status

integer.description: Whether comments are allowed on this node: 0 = no, 1 = closed (read only), 2 = open (read/write).
integer.caption: Comment
integer.name: comment

integer.description: Boolean indicating whether the node should be displayed on the front page.
integer.caption: Promote
integer.name: promote

integer.description: Boolean indicating whether the node should be displayed at the top of lists in which it appears.
integer.caption: Sticky
integer.name: sticky

integer.description: The translation set id for this node, which equals the node id of the source post in each set.
integer.caption: Tnid
integer.name: tnid

integer.description: A boolean indicating whether this translation page needs to be updated.
integer.caption: Translated
integer.name: translated

integer.description: A Unix timestamp indicating when this version was created.
integer.caption: Revision Timestamp
integer.name: revisionTimestamp

integer.description: The users.uid that created this version.
integer.caption: Revision Uid
integer.name: revisionUid

integer.description: The Unix timestamp when the node was created.
integer.caption: Created
integer.name: created

integer.description: The Unix timestamp when the node was most recently saved.
integer.caption: Changed
integer.name: changed

integer.description: The comment.cid of the last comment.
integer.caption: Cid
integer.name: cid

integer.description: The timestamp of the last comment that was posted within this node, from comment.changed.
integer.caption: Last Comment Timestamp
integer.name: lastCommentTimestamp

string.description: The name of the latest author to post a comment on this node, from comment.name.
string.caption: Last Comment Name
string.name: lastCommentName

integer.description: The user ID of the latest author to post a comment on this node, from comment.uid.
integer.caption: Last Comment Uid
integer.name: lastCommentUid

integer.description: The total number of comments on this node.
integer.caption: Comment Count
integer.name: commentCount

radioBoolean.description: Provide a reference to a bean or use an expression
radioBoolean.caption: Reference or expression
radioBoolean.name: useReference

integer.description: Primary Key: Unique term ID.
integer.caption: Tid
integer.name: tid

integer.description: The taxonomy vocabulary vid of the vocabulary to which the term is assigned. See.
integer.caption: Vid
integer.name: vid

integer.description: The weight of this term in relation to other terms.
integer.caption: Weight
integer.name: weight

integer.description: Depth of the node in the vocabulary tree.
integer.caption: Depth
integer.name: depth

element-controller-list.description: List of term Id that of wich this is considered a son.
element-controller-list.caption: Parents

string.description: The vocabulary machine name of the vocabulary to witch the term is assigned. See.
string.caption: Vocabulary Machine Name
string.name: vocabularyMachineName

radioBoolean.description: Provide a reference to a bean or use an expression
radioBoolean.caption: Reference or expression
radioBoolean.name: useReference

integer.description: Primary Key: Unique vocabulary ID.
integer.caption: Vid
integer.name: vid

integer.description: The type of hierarchy allowed within the vocabulary. (0 = disabled, 1 = single, 2 = multiple).
integer.caption: Hierarchy
integer.name: hierarchy

integer.description: The weight of this vocabulary in relation to other vocabularies.
integer.caption: Weight
integer.name: weight

string.description: The module which created the vocabulary.
string.caption: Module
string.name: module

radioBoolean.description: Provide a reference to a bean or use an expression
radioBoolean.caption: Reference or expression
radioBoolean.name: useReference

integer.description: Primary Key: Unique user ID.
integer.caption: Uid
integer.name: uid

integer.description: Timestamp for when user was created.
integer.caption: Created
integer.name: created

integer.description: Timestamp for previous time user accessed the site.
integer.caption: Access
integer.name: access

integer.description: Timestamp for users last login.
integer.caption: Login
integer.name: login

integer.description: Whether the user is active(1) or blocked(0).
integer.caption: Status
integer.name: status

integer.description: File_managed.fid of users picture. Check.
integer.caption: Picture
integer.name: picture

string.description: E-mail address used for initial account creation.
string.caption: Init
string.name: init

string.description: A serialized array of name value pairs that are related to the user. Use of this field is discouraged and it will likely disappear in a future...
string.caption: Data
string.name: data

element-controller-map.description: A map that contains pairs of role id and role description for the user.
element-controller-map.caption: Roles
